data_analysis.recommended_data_retention: 2 years for optimization, 6 months for real-time

timing_optimization.peak_volatility_strategy: Increase trade frequency during high volatility hours
timing_optimization.low_volatility_strategy: Reduce trade size during low volatility periods

implementation_priority: 1. Implement time-based trading (focus on high-volatility hours)
2. Optimize trade size based on backtest results
3. Add dynamic stop-loss based on current volatility
5. Add correlation analysis with major market indicators
6. Implement adaptive position sizing based on recent performance
7. Add multi-timeframe analysis for entry/exit signals
